# JGNsc

Joint Gene Network Construction by Single Cell RNA Sequencing Data under Multiple Conditions


## Cite our work:
Pending. The manuscript is in preparation.

## Installation
The development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/):
```{r, eval=F}
if (!require("devtools")) {
  install.packages("devtools")
}
devtools::install_github("meichendong/JGNsc")
```


## Example & Tutorial
Detailed tutorial is available [here](https://meichendong.github.io/JGNsc/articles/JGNsc.html).
